title: 'She said yes!' AFL star set to marry his glamorous blonde girlfriend after proposing in New Zealand
text:
AFL star Jamie Cripps is set to marry his glamorous blonde girlfriend after a romantic proposal in New Zealand.

The West Coast Eagles forward got down on one knee and popped the question to his partner Liv Stanley while on an end of season trip in Queenstown.

The 27-year-old was first romantically linked with Ms Stanley after a public outing in 2017 at the John Worsfold medal ceremony in 2017.

AFL star Jamie Cripps is set to marry his glamorous blonde girlfriend Liv Stanley (both pictured) after a romantic proposal in New Zealand

The West Coast Eagles forward got down on one knee and popped the question to Stanley while on an end of season trip in Queenstown

The 24-year-old model said yes, with the happy couple posting a loving selfie showing off her new diamond ring on their respective Instagram pages.

'YES to forever with you,' Stanley said, with congratulations messages pouring in from her 8,000 followers.

'Amazing! Over the moon for you two lovers!' posted Cripps' West Coast teammate Jack Redden's partner Aymee.

Cripps left a simple caption on his post, saying 'she said yes.'

Cripps and Stanley have been exploring New Zealand with another of Cripp's Eagles teammates Liam Duggan, and his partner Lauren Goold.

The group were spotted celebrating the good news at River-T Estate Wines on the South Island.

The 27-year-old has been romantically linked with Stanley (pictured) after their first public outing in 2017 at the John Worsfold medal ceremony in 2017
description: AFL star Jamie Cripps is set to marry his glamorous blonde girlfriend after a romantic proposal in New Zealand.
authors: Jackson Barron For Daily Mail Australia
